locale.productDescription: a graphical interface for automating the installation of the most commonly requested applications for Linux
locale.enterPassword: Please enter your password to use Hypermatix64.
locale.debugHelp: display all warnings, no matter how small
locale.dumplogHelp: show the log file and exit
locale.incorrectExecutableError: You can't run Hypermatix64 like this. Try '/usr/bin/hypermatix64' instead.
locale.runningInDebugMode: Hypermatix64 is running in debug mode. All errors, no matter how small, will be displayed.
locale.cannotCreateConfError: Cannot create the Hypermatix64 configuration folder.
locale.incorrectSystemError: Hypermatix64 is not intended for use on {0}.
locale.notRunningAsRootError: Hypermatix64 must be run as root!\nPlease try again.
locale.notConnectedError: Internet Disruption\nPlease check that you are connected to the Internet.\nIf you are connected and getting this message please try again later.
locale.aboutText: Hypermatix64 is developed and maintained by RogueAI (Declan Hoare). It is based on Ultamatix by TheeMahn, which is in turn based on Automatix2 by the Automatix Team. The Web page of Hypermatix64 can be found at http://home.exetel.com.au/declanhoare/hypermatix64. The GitHub repository is located at https://github.com/RogueAI42/hypermatix64. If you have suggestions or requests, please send them to declanhoare@exemail.com.au. Thanks to everyone else who has indirectly contributed to Hypermatix64 or its predecessors.
